passage_text: The XLE comes pretty well equipped as standard, with first-and second-row leather seats, heated front seats, power-sliding side doors, a power rear hatch, a power sunroof, and tri-zone climate control. Details: 2015 Toyota Camry. The 2015 Toyota Camry is a five-seat sedan that is available in LE, SE, XSE and XLE trims. A 2.5-liter four-cylinder engine is standard and a 3.5-liter V6 is available. Both engines come with a six-speed automatic transmission and front-wheel drive. The Toyota Camry Hybrid is reviewed separately. The Camry receives a major refresh for the 2015 model year, but its last full redesign was in 2012.
